name: Crazy People
description: This is a cartoon shooting game where players manipulate cartoon characters to engage in intense shooting battles, completing tasks time and time again. Different modes and games can bring different experiences, improving their combat ability and level. The ultra casual gameplay and humorous painting style make the overall atmosphere very relaxed, avoiding enemy attacks on the way forward. You can constantly move to adjust your position, click the left mouse button to fire bullets, eliminate nearby enemies, and then shoot and destroy objects that hinder your progress!
